channel.title: [562] Experience Rates
channel.description:
Hello.
I need a little help. I've been trying to get my server experience rates to be a little slower. I don't like hitting a 2 and getting 14 levels.
I've looked around several different classes to no avail. I would really like to know which class or even as specific as the void or function that controls it.

item.title: [562] Experience Rates
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy

Read full topic
